pr_title: Kerberos datasource bindings and password support

timeline.message: Add test for rebinding auth-data in IBM binding files
Add support for providing kerberos password via authData password attribute

timeline.bodyText: I just wonder why we do not use WSCallbackHandlerImpl.java instead of Krb5CallbackHandler?
timeline.author: utle

replies.bodyText: I didn't know we had WSCallbackHandlerImpl, I could use that but it looks like we'd need to also supply a username for that callback, and here I just want to supply a password specifically for PasswordCallbacks
replies.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: I think you can supply null for user name
replies.author: utle

replies.bodyText: will change this to WSCallbackHandlerImpl in a follow-on item
replies.author: aguibert
